snippet: Angélique Kidjo, the songwriter and singer from Benin, has kept African languages and an African sensibility at the core of her music.
abstract: Singer and songwriter Angelique Kidjo has a new album out and has just released autobiography Spirit Rising: My Life, My Music, which traces story of determined woman with potent voice who emerged from small town on coast of Benin in West Africa.
lead_paragraph: Angélique Kidjo, the songwriter and singer from Benin, has kept African languages and an African sensibility at the core of her music.

headline.seo: Angélique Kidjo Has Never Left Africa Behind
headline.main: A Continent on Her Musical Map
headline.print_headline: A Continent on Her Musical Map
